results.name: Total loss
results.description: Based on the amount of damage, it can be assumed to be a total loss. I would be happy to make an appointment with our expert to verify this.

results.name: Follow-up Processing
results.description: This case can not been processed, we would suggest a follow-up processing.

results.name: Follow-up Processing
results.description: This case can not been processed, we would suggest a follow-up processing.

results.name: Body shop
results.description: Safety-relevant parts on your vehicle were probably damaged in the accident. I would therefore recommend that you have your vehicle repaired at our partner body shop. I would be happy to arrange an appointment directly at a body shop near you.

results.name: Cash settlement
results.description: Presumably, no safety-relevant parts were damaged on your vehicle. Most customers would decide for a cash settlement in such a case. In this case, you will receive a payout instead of the repair. You can request a line-by-line calculation via Easy Claim.

defaultResult.name: Body shop
defaultResult.description: Safety-relevant parts on your vehicle were probably damaged in the accident. I would therefore recommend that you have your vehicle repaired at our partner body shop. I would be happy to arrange an appointment directly at a body shop near you.
